Name: general
Description: RenderState interface provides read-only access to the render state.

Name: getRenderParameters
Description: Returns an RenderParameters object representing the private and public render parameters.

Name: getRenderParameters2
Description: The RenderParameters object return by this method is immutable.

Name: getRenderParameters3
Description: If no render parameters are available, the object will be empty.

Name: getPortletMode
Description: Returns the current portlet mode of the portlet.

Name: getPortletMode2
Description: If the portlet mode is not available, PortletMode.UNDEFINED is returned.

Name: getWindowState
Description: Returns the current window state of the portlet.

Name: getWindowState2
Description: If the window state is not available, WindowState.UNDEFINED is returned.

Name: getRenderParameters
Description: Returns an MutableRenderParameters object representing the private and public render parameters.

Name: getRenderParameters2
Description: The MutableRenderParameters object return by this method is mutable.

Name: getRenderParameters3
Description: If no render parameters are available, the object will be empty.

Name: getPortletMode
Description: Sets the portlet mode of a portlet to the given portlet mode.

Name: getPortletMode2
Description: A custom portlet mode declared in deployment descriptor could be set.

Name: getPortletMode3
Description: Not more than one portlet mode can be set. If more than one portlet mode is set, only the last one set is valid.

Name: getPortletMode4
Description: Throws PortletModeException if the portlet cannot switch to this mode.

Name: getPortletMode5
Description: Throws IllegalStateException if the method is invoked after sendRedirect has been called.

Name: getPortletMode6
Description: Throws IllegalArgumentException if the input parameter is null.

Name: getWindowState
Description: Sets the window state of a portlet to the given window state.

Name: getWindowState2
Description: A custom window state declared in deployment descriptor could be set.

Name: getWindowState3
Description: Not more than one window state can be set. If more than one window state is set, only the last one set is valid.

Name: getWindowState4
Description: Throws WindowStateException if the portlet cannot switch to this state.

Name: getWindowState5
Description: Throws IllegalStateException if the method is invoked after sendRedirect has been called.

Name: getWindowState6
Description: Throws IllegalArgumentException if the input parameter is null.
